metadata.title: CVE-2024-21812 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description: An integer overflow vulnerability exists in the sopen_FAMOS_readfunctionality of The Biosig Project libbiosig 2.5.0 and Master Branch(ab0ee111). A specially crafted .famos file can lead to an out-of-boundswrite which in turn can lead to arbitrary code execution. An attacker canprovide a malicious file to trigger this vulnerability.

criterions.comment: biosig package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
